title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: After the new patch (most of the times) i try to login to league but this messsage pop ups   http://prntscr.com/gwl3eq  .i deleted and re-install the game and this still happens.Sometimes i can login and some i can t.Pleae help.Sorry for the bad english.Also i can connect to my acc at euw server but i can t on eune.My friends that came to my home can t connect either their accs on the eune server.Also i tried to repair but nothing changed.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is just having problems getting a clear signal to the EUNE servers. Check out our steps on updating your Port Forwarding and DNS settings in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a couple ways to get a better link with those servers! If that doesn't help, we might be able to get you logged in by using a VPN for the time being.
